column4: how do i see what file system a disk i have listed in fdisk is?
im trying to mount it to no avail
how do i see what file system a disk i have listed in fdisk is? i'm trying to mount the disk and i tried ext2, ext3, & ext4 guessing, mount is telling me they are all incorrect.
open gparted - and it will tell you what file system the drive is..
